document.heading: Community Impact Statement Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-259, the “Community Impact Statement Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-549, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 4, 2010, and June 1, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 28, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-446 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-259 became effective on November 6, 2010.
